_comments.createDCE: When true, creates DCE-based DCRs using dcr-template-with-dce.json. When false, creates Direct DCRs using dcr-template-direct.json
_comments.keepTemplateVersions: Number of timestamped backup templates to keep per table. The *-latest.json files are NEVER deleted.
_comments.cleanupOldTemplates: When true, removes old timestamped templates but always preserves the *-latest.json files
_comments.skipExistingDCEs: Only applies when createDCE=true. When true, skips DCE creation if DCE already exists.
_comments.templateOnly: When true, connects to Azure to retrieve actual table schemas and generates ARM templates but does NOT deploy any resources (DCEs or DCRs). Templates are saved for manual deployment. Requires Azure authentication and workspace access.

customTableSettings.enabled: When true, enables custom table mode. The script will create custom tables (_CL suffix) if they don't exist, using schemas from the schemasDirectory.
customTableSettings.schemasDirectory: Directory containing JSON schema files for custom tables. Each file should be named TableName_CL.json or TableName.json.
customTableSettings.customTableListFile: Table list file for custom tables. Used when customTableMode is enabled.
customTableSettings.nativeTableListFile: Table list file for native tables. Default is NativeTableList.json.
customTableSettings.defaultRetentionDays: Default retention period in days for custom tables (can be overridden in schema files).
customTableSettings.defaultTotalRetentionDays: Default total retention period in days including archive (can be overridden in schema files).
customTableSettings.autoCreateTables: When true, automatically creates custom tables if they don't exist and schema files are found.
customTableSettings.migrateExistingTablesToDCRBased: When true, prompts to migrate EXISTING custom tables from classic to DCR-based ingestion. Does NOT affect newly created tables.
customTableSettings.autoMigrateExistingTables: When true, automatically migrates EXISTING custom tables to DCR-based ingestion without prompting. Only applies to already existing tables, not newly created ones.
